top.title: Hurricane Melissa death toll rises as aid struggles to reach parts of Jamaica
top.summary: Authorities report at least 30 people have been killed in Haiti and 19 in Jamaica as a result of the devastating storm.

top.title: US strikes on alleged drug boats violate law, UN human rights chief says
top.summary: Volker Türk said the strikes were "unacceptable" and urged Washington to halt them immediately.

top.title: Election protesters defy army chief in third day of Tanzania unrest
top.summary: Some deaths have been reported though accurate figures are hard to obtain due to the internet shutdown.

top.title: Watchdog slams O2 over unexpected price rise
top.summary: The media regulator said it was disappointed O2 raised prices more than was advertised when customers took out contracts.

top.title: First UK phones to get satellite connectivity in signal blackspots announced
top.summary: Virgin Media O2 has partnered with Elon Musk firm Starlink to offer the service.

top.title: Websites disabled in Microsoft global outage come back online
top.summary: Microsoft 365 and its Azure cloud computing platform were hit with DNS issues, similar to the recent AWS outage.

Perplexity’s new AI tool aims to simplify patent research
ESPN, ABC, and other Disney channels go dark on YouTube TV
